QuestData.Title: Totem of Tikti
QuestData.Description: You begin to read the totem, better able to pronounce the words and phrases. Words start to form in your head. You think that the totem is telling you to go across the Crystalbrook river to the east. Perhaps your destination is on the other side of the river.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Totem of Tikti using the clues provided to you.
QuestData.RewardText: The totem has various primal markings. You see owls, bears, wolves and stags carved into the surface of the totem.$B$BYou note a strange collection of symbols that makes your mouth form the word T-I-K-T-I.
